original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo attano bhaṇḍakaṁ apassantiyo caṇḍakāḷiṁ bhikkhuniṁ etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyaḥ attanaḥ bhaṇḍakam a passantiyaḥ caṇḍakāḷim bhikkhunim etat avocuḥ

original: “ahameva nūna corī, ahameva nūna alajjinī, yā ayyāyo attano bhaṇḍakaṁ apassantiyo tā maṁ evamāhaṁsu—
analyzed: aham eva nūna corī aham eva nūna alajjinī yāḥ ayyāyaḥ attanaḥ bhaṇḍakam a passantiyaḥ tāḥ mama evam āhasu

original: Sacāhaṁ, ayye, tumhākaṁ bhaṇḍakaṁ gaṇhāmi, assamaṇī homi, brahmacariyā cavāmi, nirayaṁ upapajjāmi;
analyzed: sacā āha ayye tumhākam bhaṇḍakam gaṇhāmi assamaṇī homi brahmacariyā cavāmi nirayam upapajjāmi

original: yā pana maṁ abhūtena evamāha sāpi assamaṇī hotu, brahmacariyā cavatu, nirayaṁ upapajjatū”ti.
analyzed: yā pana mam abhūtena evam āha sā api assamaṇī hotu brahmacariyā cavatu nirayam upapajjatu uti

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma ayyā caṇḍakāḷī attānampi parampi nirayenapi brahmacariyenapi abhisapissatī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma ayyā caṇḍakāḷī attānam pi param pi nirayena api brahmacariyena api abhisapissati iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī attānampi parampi nirayenapi brahmacariyenapi abhisapatī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī attānam pi param pi nirayena api brahmacariyena api abhisapati iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī attānampi parampi nirayenapi brahmacariyenapi abhisapissati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī attānam pi param pi nirayena api brahmacariyena api
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī attānaṁ vā paraṁ vā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī attānam vā param vā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapeyya pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: Nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Upasampannāya upasampannasaññā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: upasampannāya upasampanna saññā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Upasampannāya vematikā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: upasampannāya vematikā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Upasampannāya anupasampannasaññā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: upasampannāya anupasampanna saññā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Tiracchānayoniyā vā pettivisayena vā manussadobhaggena vā abhisapati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: tiracchāna yoniyā vā pettivisayena vā manussa dobhaggena vā abhisapati āpatti dukkaṭassa
an upasampannāya upasampanna saññā āpatti dukkaṭassa
an upasampannāya an upasampanna saññā āpatti dukkaṭassa
